text: The 1991 Tulip European Open was a professional ranking snooker tournament that took place in March 1991 at the Imax Centre in Rotterdam in the Netherlands. Tony Jones won the tournament, defeating Mark Johnston-Allen 9–7 in the final. __TOC__ ==Main draw== ==References== Category:European Masters (snooker) Category:1991 in snooker Category:1991 in Dutch sport European Open (snooker) Category:Snooker in the Netherlands
title: 1991 European Open (snooker)
